content.question: A spinner made for a game of chance has 8 equally likely spaces. Alfonso records the result of a sample of 400 spins. Alfonso decides to calculate a chi-square test statistic for a goodness-of-fit test to see whether the spinner is fair. Which of the following is the appropriate null hypothesis?

choices.label: <math alttext="H sub 0: p sub 1 equals 0.125, p sub 2 equals 0.125, p sub 3 equals 0.125, p sub 4 equals 0.125, p sub 5 equals 0.125, p sub 6 equals 0.125, p sub 7 equals 0.125, p sub 8 equals 0.125" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.125</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0:" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext><mtext></mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> At least one proportion is different.

<math alttext="H sub 0: p sub 1 is not equal to 0.125, p sub 2 is not equal to 0.125, p sub 3 is not equal to 0.125, p sub 4 is not equal to 0.125, p sub 5 is not equal to 0.125, p sub 6 is not equal to 0.125, p sub 7 is not equal to 0.125, p sub 8 is not equal to 0.125" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.125</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: p sub 1 equals 0.08, p sub 2 equals 0.08, p sub 3 equals 0.08, p sub 4 equals 0.08, p sub 5 equals 0.08, p sub 6 equals 0.08, p sub 7 equals 0.08, p sub 8 equals 0.08" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.08</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.2: Setting up a Chi-Square Goodness of Fit Test

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
